description: Scarron runs the pub Miwaku no Yousei which is similar to the modern day maid cafe with all the waitresses dressed in colouful and revealing maid uniforms. He has feminine-speech and feminine-gestures despite muscularity, and workers call him not "master" but "ma madamoiselle". He also has a tendency to call out "Tres Bien!". Also uncle of Siesta and surprising everyone that he is the father of Jessica (or just the fact that he is a father).
name: Scarron
